name: Quarantined Delivery
description:
Deliver the packages before you get infected!
Remember to keep social distancing in this survival-type of game, and try not to get COVID-19.

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement
LShift - Running
Space - Interact
Tab - Open phone
ESC - Pause

HOW TO PLAY

Use your character to move around, and try to deliver the packages as fast as possible. Use your phone to guide yourself, buy powerups and try to dodge people maintaining social distancing before the timer ends!
